metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6662 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Oracle MySQL through 5.5.52, 5.6.x through 5.6.33, and 5.7.x through5.7.15; MariaDB before 5.5.51, 10.0.x before 10.0.27, and 10.1.x before10.1.17; and Percona Server before 5.5.51-38.1, 5.6.x before 5.6.32-78.0,and 5.7.x before 5.7.14-7 allow local users to create arbitraryconfigurations and bypass certain protection mechanisms by settinggeneral_log_file to a my.cnf configuration. NOTE: this can be leveraged toexecute arbitrary code with root privileges by setting malloc_lib. NOTE:the affected MySQL version information is from Oracle's October 2016 CPU.Oracle has not commented on third-party claims that the issue was silentlypatched in MySQL 5.5.52, 5.6.33, and 5.7.15.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

percona-xtradb-cluster-server - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
